name: William MADARA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BUREAU OF STATE LOTTERIES

judges: WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen Cohen, Shamokin Dam, for appellant.
Nicholas J. Lamberti, Asst. Counsel, Mechanicsburg, Raymond Kleiman, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
434 A.2d 716
William MADARA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BUREAU OF STATE LOTTERIES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 28, 1981.
Decided Sept. 24, 1981.
Stephen Cohen, Shamokin Dam, for appellant.
Nicholas J. Lamberti, Asst. Counsel, Mechanicsburg, Raymond Kleiman, for appellee.
